2015 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque 2.2 SD4 Pure Tech AWD 5dr

€16,837.00

Categories: Europe Fleet, Land Rover, Our Fleet Tags: EVOQUE, Range Rover
  • Description

Description

It’s got full service history, on its last one the rear brake pads were replaced along with new lock/latches on both front doors.

4-Wheel Drive, Anti-Lock Brakes (ABS), Driver Airbag, Electronic Stability Program (ESP), Passenger Airbag, Rear seat belts, Safety Belt Pretensioners, Side Airbags, Alarm, Immobiliser, CD Player, Navigation System, Air Conditioning, Auxiliary heating, Climate Control, Cruise Control, Electric heated seats, Leather Seats, Power-assisted Steering (PAS), Power Locks, Alloy Wheels, Catalytic Converter.
Mileage: 29,000
Transmission: Automatic

About Company

Since 2015, our mission was to provide the highest level of service to our clients. We started our car transport company so we could work for ourselves.

We run our vehicle shipping business with our customers in mind and treat them with respect.
